name: Colored Doors
description:
This is a single-level labyrinth called "Colored Doors". The object is to unlock the different colors of doors in order to leave the labyrinth. The controls are as follows:

  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • Mouse - Move camera
  • E - Interact with an object when prompted
  • Alf-F4 - Quit the game

This was a project I did for school and a proof of concept for the game's main mechanic. Except for the FPS Controller, all of the programming and design work was done by me over a period of 4 weeks.
